lyric: 作词 : 尹纯青Eyn
作曲 : 蔡近翰Zoe(HOYO-MiX)
编曲 : 郑宇界JODODO(HOYO-MiX)
Raging wind while your visage fades away
translation: 当你的面容枯萎 飓风大作

lyric: Where the world lies in pieces at my feet
translation: 这便是在我脚下粉碎的世界

lyric: The fire and the storm and the snow and the mist
translation: 烈火与风暴，降雪与迷雾

lyric: Struggle inside，help me gain insight
translation: 忍痛于怀，辅我知觉

lyric: Hail my proud queen ，on and on on and on
translation: 女王万岁 不绝于耳

lyric: That wax and wane showed its ebb and flow
translation: 阴晴圆缺有其涨落

lyric: Selah，selah，are chanting evermore
translation: 休止声声无休无止

lyric: Hear，oh hear all the voices trapped in thee
translation: 侧耳倾听汝之心声

lyric: See myself in your eyes that’s colorless
translation: 在你的失色的瞳仁中我看见自己

lyric: Visions pass and emotions run through me
translation: 幻觉过后我的情感倾泻而出

lyric: Struggle inside，helped me gain insight
translation: 忍痛于怀，辅我知觉

lyric: Hail my proud queen ，on and on on and on
translation: 女王万岁 不绝于耳

lyric: That wax and wane showed its ebb and flow
translation: 阴晴圆缺有其涨落

lyric: Selah，selah，are chanting evermore
translation: 休止声声无休无止

lyric: Hear，oh hear all the voices trapped in thee
translation: 侧耳倾听汝之心声

lyric: Fair moonlight，will you fill my void eyes？
translation: 公义之月，你会盈满我空洞的目光吗？

lyric: Hail my proud queen ，on and on...
translation: 女王万岁 不绝于耳

lyric: Hail my proud queen ，on and on...
translation: 女王万岁 不绝于耳

lyric: Selah，selah，are chanting evermore
translation: 休止声声无休无止

lyric: Hear，oh hear all the voices trapped in thee
translation: 侧耳倾听汝之心声

lyric: 混音：宫奇Gon(HOYO-MiX)
录音：江浩廷
